definition: to dig out/to pick out (with one's fingers)/to carve/to cut/to study meticulously/to lift one's clothes/stingy/miserly
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek
(neologism c. 2014) celebrity with a huge, devoted fan base/celebrity with a huge following on social media
in arithmetic of subtraction, to borrow 10 and carry from the next place
cast and crew/performers and production team

(TV or movie) blooper/continuity error/(theater) to flub one's lines/unintended exposure of a body part/to be exposed (of a scheme or trick)/to reveal sth one intended to conceal through a slip of the tongue/to blow one's cover
to put on a play/to perform/fig. to pretend/to feign
(of an actor) to disengage from the performance (e.g. after the show ends)/(of an audience) to lose interest in the performance
stand-in/substitute/body double/stuntman/scapegoat/fall guy/to stand in for sb else
